name: Space Overlords
description: After escaping imprisonment, begin a destructive rampage of galactic proportions to restore your honour and bring vengeance to those that betrayed you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or above Processor: 2 GHz CPU Dual core or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated graphics with 512MB memory (DX9 compatible) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard compatible, 360 controller reccomended
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 or above Processor: i3 2.4 Ghz or faster Graphics: Dedicated graphics with 1GB memory (DX9 compatible) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard compatible, 360 controller reccomended
